verbose_text: The K-Rta point mutation R160A abolished DNA binding of K-Rta aa 1-490/VP16, reduced transactivation of the short Mta and vMIP-I reporters, and eliminated transactivation of the short PAN and kaposin reporters.
evidence: K-Rta point mutation R160A abolished DNA binding of K-Rta aa 1-490/VP16, reduced transactivation of the short Mta and vMIP-I reporters, and eliminated transactivation of the short PAN and kaposin
